com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.utils

Class InventoryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.utils.InventoryUtils

  • public final class InventoryUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for common Inventory operations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void fillAll(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack filler)
      Fills ALL slots in an inventory with the filler item
      static void fillCorners(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack filler)
      Fills the "corners" of an inventory with the filler item.
      static void fillEmpty(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack filler)
      Fills all empty slots in an inventory with the filler item
      static void fillWithColoredPanes(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, short one, short two, boolean paneGlow)
      Fills an inventory entirely with colored glass panes
      static void swapPaneColor(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, short one, short two)
      Swaps the colors of glass panes in an inventory, can be used in combination with InventoryUtils#fillWithColoredPanes to easily have animated inventories

      • fillCorners

        public static void fillCorners(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack filler)
        Fills the "corners" of an inventory with the filler item. The corners of an inventory includes every slot in the first/last row and the first/last slot of the rows in between
        Parameters:
        inventory - inventory
        filler - filler

      • fillWithColoredPanes

        public static void fillWithColoredPanes(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                        short one,
                                        short two,
                                        boolean paneGlow)
        Fills an inventory entirely with colored glass panes
        Parameters:
        inventory - inventory
        one - color one
        two - color two
        paneGlow - should the panes glow

      • swapPaneColor

        public static void swapPaneColor(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                 short one,
                                 short two)
        Swaps the colors of glass panes in an inventory, can be used in combination with InventoryUtils#fillWithColoredPanes to easily have animated inventories
        Parameters:
        inventory - inventory
        one - one
        two - two
